verses.verse: So, you, my child, receive ability in the generosity, the generosity in the Anointed King Jesus.
And what you heard from the side of me through many witnesses, place these things beside trustable people, some who will be sufficient to also teach different people.
So you must suffer tough hardships as a nice soldier of Jesus, the Anointed King.
No one serving in the military is entangled with the transactions of his life so that he might satisfy the one who enlisted the soldiers.
Also if someone competes, he is not crowned with an award wreath unless he competes according to the rules.
It is necessary for the laboring farmer to first be receiving of the fruits with others.
Be aware of what I say. You see, the Master will give you understanding in all kinds of things.
Remember Jesus, the Anointed King, who has been gotten up from the dead, from David's seed, in line with my good news,
in which I suffer tough hardships up to restraints, as if I am an outlaw, but the message of God has not been locked up.
Because of this, I persist to do what is right in all things because of the select people, so that they also might obtain the rescue in the Anointed King Jesus with magnificence that spans all time.
The message is trustable. You see, if we died together, we will also live together.
If we persist to do what is right, we will also be kings together. If we deny Him, that One will also deny us.
If we don't trust, that One stays trustable. He is not able to deny Himself.
Quietly remember these things, being a strong witness in the sight of the Master not to be arguing about words based on nothing useful, based on a disaster of the people listening.
Make every effort to offer yourself up, approved to God, an unashamed worker, being straight with the message of the truth.
Stand clear of the profane meaningless voices. You see, they will progress on to more of godlessness,
and their message will have a pasture as gangrene, of whom is Hymenaeus and Philetus,
some who missed the target concerning the truth (saying the return back to life to have already happened) and overturn the trust of some.
However, the solid foundation of God has stood having this seal: "The Master knew the people who are His." And, "Everyone who names the name of the Master must stay away from the wrong way."
In a huge house, there is not only gold and silver containers, but also wooden and ceramic, and some that are for value, others that are for no value.
So if anyone cleans himself off from these things, he will be a container for value that has been made sacred and very useful to the owner, that has been readied for every good action.
Escape the more youthful desires. Pursue the right way, trust, love, peace with the people who call on the Master from a clean heart.
Refuse the foolish and undisciplined questionings, realizing that they give birth to arguments.
It is not necessary for a slave of the Master to be arguing, but to be gentle to everyone, able to teach, tolerant of bad things,
in humility disciplining the people who oppose God's treaty, so that perhaps God might give them a change of ways to a correct understanding of truth,
and they might be sober again out of the trap of the Accuser, who have been caught alive by him for what that Accuser wants.
